column4: Has anyone else come across the (initramfs) prompt while attempting to boot off the v8.10 CD? I'm having troubles getting past that point
what initramfs problem are you experiencing
No idea. When I attempt to boot off the 8.10 CD it eventually takes me to an (initramfs) prompt, and sits there. If I do 'exit' it will spit out a kernel panic
i just downloaded the latest live cd let me see if i have any problems at boot
before you burned the iso file did you check the MD5 sums?
no just do the md5 check first
Can't. The ISO image is at work. I'm at home now =p
the download path is jammed i have 3 level hs dsl and took over 2 hours
Wonder if I could find a torrent
no problems here with initramfs booting from live cd
Mhmm, my wife's PC just did the CD check, worked fine
Download is going fast though, so no worries. =)
good perhaps you will have no more problems
Wife's PC just booted off the CD fine. My PC is just the suck.
